docs.lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of people marched in towns across Ireland on Saturday in a second day of mass protests against water charges, the biggest display of opposition to government austerity measures since the country's banking crisis and bailout in 2010.

headline.main: Mass Water Protests Put Pressure on Irish Government
headline.print_headline: Mass Water Protests Put Pressure on Irish Government

docs.snippet: Tens of thousands of people marched in towns across Ireland on Saturday in a second day of mass protests against water charges, the biggest display of opposition to government austerity measures since the country's banking crisis and bailout in 2010.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a year that was supposed to be dominated by attacks on the Affordable Care Act, few Republican candidates focused on repeal or offered alternatives.

headline.main: Repeal of Health Law, Once Central to G.O.P., Is Side Issue in Campaigns
headline.print_headline: G.O.P.’s Assault on Health Law Fades in Races

docs.abstract: Attacks on Affordable Care Act had been staple of Republican Senate campaigns across country during early months of election season, but focus has shifted to broad condemnation of Pres Obama's policies; even though some Republicans vow to repeal law, almost none have presented alternative plan.
docs.snippet: In a year that was supposed to be dominated by attacks on the Affordable Care Act, few Republican candidates focused on repeal or offered alternatives.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Most parents know that their children are legally adults when they turn 18. But the full significance may not be apparent until something drives it home.

headline.main: Beyond a Parent’s Reach: When a Child Legally Becomes an Adult
headline.print_headline: Beyond a Parent’s Reach: When a Child Legally Becomes an Adult

docs.abstract: Alina Tugend Shortcuts column points out parents often fail to appreciate full significance of fact that their children become legal adults when they turn 18; notes that having conversation about a child's rights and responsibilities when they turn 18 is a good first step.
docs.snippet: Most parents know that their children are legally adults when they turn 18. But the full significance may not be apparent until something drives it home.
